Ability.Name: --InitializePvE--
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_failroad.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_failroad.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--Keybinds mockingBannerKey = IsLeftShiftKeyDown() heroicLeapKey = IsLeftControlKeyDown() demoBannerKey = IsLeftAltKeyDown() -- = IsRightShiftKeyDown() -- = IsRightControlKeyDown() pauseKey = IsRightAltKeyDown()
--options useDR = false glyphOfGagOrder = true
--FixLag local ping = tonumber((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 2000) + .025
if ping < .05 then ping = .05 elseif ping > .3 then ping = .3 end PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ping
--FixStance(Based on Spec) --Arms if GetSpecialization() == 1 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if IsEquippedItemType("shields") == true then if UseEquipmentSet("2HSet") ~= nil then return true end end end
--Fury if GetSpecialization() == 2 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if IsEquippedItemType("shields") == true then if UseEquipmentSet("FurySet") ~= nil then return true end end end
--Prot if GetSpecialization() == 3 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) end
if not IsEquippedItemType("shields") == true then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") ~= nil then return true end end end
--PauseKey if pauseKey ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: --InitializePvP--
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_failroad.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_failroad.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--Keybinds mockingBannerKey = IsLeftShiftKeyDown() heroicLeapKey = IsLeftControlKeyDown() demoBannerKey = IsLeftAltKeyDown() -- = IsRightShiftKeyDown() -- = IsRightControlKeyDown() pauseKey = IsRightAltKeyDown()
--options useDR = false glyphOfGagOrder = true
--FixLag local ping = tonumber((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 2000) + .025
if ping < .05 then ping = .05 elseif ping > .3 then ping = .3 end PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ping
--FixStance(Based on Spec) --Arms if GetSpecialization() == 1 then if inCombat() == nil and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) elseif inCombat() ~= nil and inCombatAndMelee() == nil and getHp("player") <= 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombatAndMelee() ~= nil and getHp("player") < 35 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombat ~= nil and getHp("player") > 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end end
--Fury if GetSpecialization() == 2 then if inCombat() == nil and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) elseif inCombat() ~= nil and getHp("player") <= 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombat() ~= nil and getHp("player") > 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end end
--PauseKey if pauseKey ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: --Interrupts--
Ability.Lua:
local castingTarget = nil
for i=1, #custTars do if spellReflect(custTars[i]) == nil and ( select(9,UnitCastingInfo(custTars[i]))==false or select(8,UnitChannelInfo(custTars[i]))==false ) then castingTarget = custTars[i] end end
if castingTarget ~= nil and ( spellReflect(castingTarget) == nil or GetSpecialization() == 2 ) and UnitBuffID("player",23920) == nil then local castName = UnitCastingInfo(castingTarget) local channelName = UnitChannelInfo(castingTarget) local castName = channelName --Pum-- if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) == 0 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --DS-- if ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) ~= 0 or IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 0 ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(102060)) == 0 and CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) ~= nil and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(102060),castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --HT-- if glyphOfGagOrder == true and ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) ~= 0 or IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 0 ) and ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(102060)) ~= 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(57755)) == 0 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57755),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(57755),castingTarget) end end

Ability.Name: Fury_2-3Rotation
Ability.Lua:
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(845) elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 then _castSpell(845) end elseif UnitPower("player") >= 110 then _castSpell(845) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(23881) elseif getHp("target") < 20 and UnitPower("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(23881) end
if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) > 0 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) <= 1 then _castSpell(100130) end end
if inCombat() == true and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) > 0 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) <= 1 then PQR_DelayRotation(select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime())) end
if inMelee() == true then
_castSpell(86346)
_castSpell(5308)
if UnitBuffID("player",131116) then _castSpell(85288) end
if UnitBuffID("player",46916) and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if glyphOfGagOrder == false then _castSpell(57755) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346) == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end
if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(86346)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(86346)) - GetTime()) >= 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Fury_Aoe(4+)Rotation
Ability.Lua:
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if glyphOfGagOrder == false then _castSpell(57755) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(845) elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 then _castSpell(845) end elseif UnitPower("player") >= 110 then _castSpell(845) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(23881) elseif getHp("target") < 20 and UnitPower("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(23881) end
_castSpell(86346)
_castSpell(85288)
_castSpell(1680)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Arms_BasicRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Vars local tfb, _, _, tfbCount, _, _, tfbExp = UnitBuffID("player", 56638) local cs,_,_,_,_,_,csExp = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player")
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) ~= nil then _castSpell(34428) end
if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player") ~= nil then if tfb and ( tfbExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) or ( tfbCount == 5 and IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil ) or (( cs ~= nil and csExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(86346)~=0)) then _castSpell(78) elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil or UnitPower("player") > 110 then _castSpell(78) end end
_castSpell(12294)
if ( cs == nil or csExp - GetTime() <= 1.5 ) then _castSpell(86346) end
if getHp("target") < 20 then _castSpell(5308) end
if IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil then _castSpell(7384) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and ( UnitPower("player") >= 70 or cs ~= nil ) then _castSpell(1464) end end
if glyphOfGagOrder == false then _castSpell(57755) end
if inMelee() == true then if UnitPower("player") < 70 and cs == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(1464) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end end

Ability.Name: Arms_AoeRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Vars local tfb, _, _, tfbCount, _, _, tfbExp = UnitBuffID("player", 56638) local cs,_,_,_,_,_,csExp = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player")
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) ~= nil then _castSpell(34428,"target") end
if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if glyphOfGagOrder == false then _castSpell(57755) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and cs ~= nil then if tfb and ( tfbExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) or ( tfbCount == 5 and IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil ) or (( cs ~= nil and csExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(86346)~=0)) then _castSpell(78,"target") elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil or UnitPower("player") > 110 then if UnitBuffID("player",12328) ~= nil then _castSpell(78,"target") elseif UnitBuffID("player",12328) == nil then _castSpell(845,"target") end end end end
if inCombat() == true and UnitPower("player") >= 60 then _castSpell(12328) end
if inMelee() == true then _castSpell(12294,"target")
if ( cs == nil or csExp - GetTime() <= 1.5 ) then _castSpell(86346,"target") end
_castSpell(6343,"target")
if IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil then _castSpell(7384,"target") end
_castSpell(1680)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end end

Ability.Name: Arms_PvPAdditions
Ability.Lua:
--vars local shieldWall = false local sRcheck = false local useDisarm = false local shouldSlow = true
if inCombat() == true and getHp("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(97462) end
for i=1, #custTars do if spellReflect(custTars[i]) == 1 then sRcheck = true end end
if inCombat() == true and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(871))==0 and getHp("player") <= 35 then shieldWall = true end
if sRcheck == true and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23920))==0 and UnitBuffID("player",23920) == nil then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") ~= nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(23920),nil) return true end end
if shieldWall == true and not UnitBuffID("player",871) then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") ~= nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(871),nil) return true end end
if ( sRcheck == false or shieldWall == false ) and IsEquippedItemType("shields") and UnitBuffID("player",23920) == nil and UnitBuffID("player",871) == nil then if UseEquipmentSet("2HSet") ~= nil then return true end end
if inCombat() and getHp("player") <= 50 then _castSpell(118038) end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() ~= nil and isImmune(custTars[i]) ~= nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57755),custTars[i]) == 1 and UnitExists(custTars[i]) ~= nil and PQR_IsMoving() == false then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] _castSpell(64382,PQR_CustomTarget) end end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() and shouldDisarm(custTars[i]) ~= nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(676),custTars[i]) == 1 then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] useDisarm = true end end
if useDisarm == true and UnitBuffID("target",110700) == nil then _castSpell(676,PQR_CustomTarget) end
if inMelee() == true and ( isSlowed("target") ~= nil or immuneToSlow("target") ~= nil ) then shouldSlow = false end
if shouldSlow == false and UnitDebuffID("target",1715) ~= nil then local hasHamstring, _, _, _, _, _, HendTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1715) if hasHamstring ~= nil then if HendTimer - GetTime() < 1 then return true end end end
if inMelee() == true and shouldSlow == true then _castSpell(1715) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114192)) == 0 and mockingBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114192)) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114192) end
if select(2,GetTotemInfo(1)) ~= nil and ( mockingBannerKey ~= nil or demoBannerKey ~= nil ) then TargetUnit(select(2,GetTotemInfo(1))) _castSpell(3411,"target") end

Ability.Name: Fury_PvPAdditions
Ability.Lua:
--vars local useDisarm = false local shouldSlow = true
if inCombat() == true and getHp("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(97462) end
if inCombat() == true and getHp("player") <= 50 then _castSpell(118038,"player") end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() == true and isImmune(custTars[i]) ~= nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57755),custTars[i]) == 1 and UnitExists(custTars[i]) ~= nil and PQR_IsMoving() == false then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] _castSpell(64382,PQR_CustomTarget) end end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() == true and shouldDisarm(custTars[i]) ~= nil and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(676),custTars[i]) == 1 then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] useDisarm = true end end
if useDisarm == true and not UnitBuffID("target",110700) then _castSpell(676,PQR_CustomTarget) end
if inMelee() == true and ( isSlowed("target") ~= nil or immuneToSlow("target") ~= nil ) then shouldSlow = false end
if shouldSlow == false and UnitDebuffID("target",1715) ~= nil then local hasHamstring, _, _, _, _, _, HendTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1715) if hasHamstring ~= nil then if HendTimer - GetTime() < 1 then return true end end end
if inMelee() == true and shouldSlow == true then _castSpell(1715) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114192)) == 0 and mockingBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114192)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114192) end
if select(2,GetTotemInfo(1)) ~= nil and ( mockingBannerKey ~= nil or demoBannerKey ~= nil ) then TargetUnit(select(2,GetTotemInfo(1))) _castSpell(3411,"target") end

Ability.Name: Fury_BasicRotation
Ability.Lua:
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(78) elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 then _castSpell(78) end elseif UnitPower("player") >= 110 then _castSpell(78) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(23881) elseif getHp("target") < 20 and UnitPower("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(23881) end
if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) > 0 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) <= 1 then _castSpell(100130) end end
if inCombat() == true and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) > 0 and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime()) <= 1 then PQR_DelayRotation(select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(23881)) - GetTime())) end
if inMelee() == true then
_castSpell(86346)
_castSpell(5308)
if UnitBuffID("player",131116) ~= nil then _castSpell(85288) end
if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if glyphOfGagOrder == false then _castSpell(57755) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346) == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end
if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(86346)) + (select(1,GetSpellCooldown(86346)) - GetTime()) >= 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end
